resources.string: StressAway is a product that enhances the mood of a person by recommending stress relief ways based on the journal written by the person. The product analyzes the journal , understands the mood of a person and recommends music , movies, books, exercises, diet and also the places around the userâ€™s location that boosts his/her mood.

string.name: our_aim
string.i: " To help all students maintain Good Mental Health. "
